title: [Large-scale] Cognitive Load Measurement and Management Strategies in Engineering Design

context.prior_knowledge: Engineering design process knowledge and project leadership experience
context.additional_context: For corporate R&D managers/leaders, structured as 5â€“10-minute learning modules in mobile environments.

learning_goals: Learners can categorize and explain cognitive load into three types (intrinsic, extraneous, germane) during engineering design tasks.
Learners can measure team members' cognitive load using design-scenario-based assessment tools.
Based on measurement results, learners can apply three strategies (e.g., task segmentation, visualization tools) to adjust design task complexity.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
